sentence.Network_en: One young conscript rose with a message of thanks, his voice choked with emotion.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个年轻的新兵起立致谢，激动得声音哽咽。

sentence.Network_en: " No, it'd be like dragging in a conscript. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 不, 简直是拉来的夫子. ”

sentence.Network_en: They conscript both capital and labour.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们打算把资金和劳力一起征用.

as Nazis start losing the war they conscript thousands of teenagers into a " British legion " of the Waffen-SS .当纳粹德国开始输掉战争的时候，，他们招募了数以千计的青少年加入武装党卫队的退伍军人协会。

one article is added as Article 8 : " The work of directly enlisting volunteer soldiers from non-military departments shall be handled by conscription offices at various levels . "增加一条，作为第八条：“从非军事部门直接招收志愿兵的工作，由各级征兵办公室负责办理。”

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (as a noun): from French conscrit, from Latin conscriptus, past participle conscribere 'enrol'. The verb is a back-formation from conscription

entry.def: A conscript is a person who has been made to join the armed forces of a country.
If someone is conscripted, they are officially made to join the armed forces of a country.

example.ex: He was conscripted into  the German army...
Peter was conscripted like every other young man.
example.tran: 和所有其他年轻人一样，彼得应征入伍。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who is drafted into military service

auth_sentence.content: But conscript Kim says he doubts all-out war will erupt.
auth_sentence.res_content: But conscript Kim says he doubts all-out war will erupt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But conscript Kim says he doubts all-out war will erupt.

auth_sentence.content: However, the conscript soldiers who fought against the British landings showed limited appetite for the fight.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, the conscript soldiers who fought against the British landings showed limited appetite for the fight.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Lee, who has spiky, gelled hair and is partial to pink polo shirts, served two years as a conscript in Korea.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con大家+script写→大家写上名字→征兵
in进入+script写+ion表名词→写进去→刻写
prescript[n.命令,规定]+ion表名词→n.药方,处方;命令

script写+ure表名词→写出[宗教]作品
trans转移+script写→把写的东西移到[另一张纸上]→transcript副本
con大家+script写→大家写上名字→征兵

sentences.en: He was conscripted into the army in 1939.
Over half the army was composed of conscripts.
sentences.cn: 军中一半以上是应征入伍者。
